Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.4ripp6EfdVpS0d60]{Enigma (Bard Muse)}

You can procure information with confidence. Whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} using any skill (including Bardic Lore), you can forgo rolling your check to instead receive a result of 10 + your proficiency bonus (don’t apply any other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

As long as you are an expert in a skill, you meet the prerequisites for the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.H3I2X0f7v4EzwxuN]{Automatic Knowledge} skill feat in that skill, even if you don’t have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Assurance} in that skill.
